title: If I like books by Nassim Taleb, which other authors might I also like? - Quora

response.answer_text: Daniel Kahneman, Amos Tversky, Richard Thaler, Aaron Brown, Gladwell, the book Unshakeable by Robbins, Michael Lewis, Spencer Johnson business books, certain plays by Mamet that deal with business, John Allen Paulos.
Try: I am right you are wrong, by De Bono I Am Right You Are Wrong: Edward De Bono: 9780141040875: Amazon.com: Books Link is just to ensure you see there is a new edition out.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Pui Lam Yiu
